metadata.title: CVE-2022-36087 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OAuthLib is an implementation of the OAuth request-signing logic for Python3.6+. In OAuthLib versions 3.1.1 until 3.2.1, an attacker providingmalicious redirect uri can cause denial of service. An attacker can alsoleverage usage of `uri_validate` functions depending where it is used.OAuthLib applications using OAuth2.0 provider support or use directly`uri_validate` are affected by this issue. Version 3.2.1 contains a patch.There are no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: python-oauthlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
